summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 18 January to end of Wednesday 19 January GMT
description: Foggy and misty start on Tuesday, clearing later in the morning with some sunny intervals. Cloud arriving in the afternoon. <br/>Overcast and rain on Wednesday. <br/><br/>Back trajectories indicate the air arriving in the UK from the Atlantic, there should be good dispersion and negligible import.<br/><br/>Overall, air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
